name: Elemental War TD
description:
Are you ready for the next level of Tower Defense games?

Endless single-player gaming fun Three innovative game modes, five difficulty levels, seven scenarios, countless maps and enemy types – the single player offers you everything you need for long-term gaming fun. Compete in rankings with your friends and players from your city, your country and the whole world – and check out how the best play via detailed rankings.

Easy to use level editor Create your own maps in the included editor and publish them so everyone can play them!
